text: April 29, 2018 / 2:01 PM / Updated 42 minutes ago UPDATE 2-IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 29 between Royal Challengers Bangalore and Kolkata Knight Riders on Sunday at Bangalore, India Kolkata Knight Riders win by 6 wickets Royal Challengers Bangalore 1st innings Quinton de Kock c Shubman Gill b Kuldeep Yadav 29 Brendon McCullum c Dinesh Karthik b Andre Russell 38 Virat Kohli Not Out 68 Manan Vohra b Andre Russell 0 Mandeep Singh c Shivam Mavi b Andre Russell 19 Colin de Grandhomme Not Out 11 Extras 1b 4lb 0nb 0pen 5w 10 Total (20.0 overs) 175-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-67 de Kock, 2-74 McCullum, 3-75 Vohra, 4-140 Singh Did Not Bat : Ashwin, Southee, Yadav, Siraj, Chahal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Piyush Chawla 3 0 22 0 7.33 Sunil Narine 4 0 38 0 9.50 Mitchell Johnson 3 0 38 0 12.67 1w Shivam Mavi 3 0 21 0 7.00 1w Kuldeep Yadav 4 0 20 1 5.00 Andre Russell 3 0 31 3 10.33 2w Kolkata Knight Riders 1st innings Chris Lynn Not Out 62 Sunil Narine c Colin de Grandhomme b Murugan Ashwin 27 Robin Uthappa c Tim Southee b Murugan Ashwin 36 Nitish Rana Retired Hurt 15 Andre Russell c Quinton de Kock b Mohammed Siraj 0 Dinesh Karthik c Virat Kohli b Mohammed Siraj 23 Shubman Gill Not Out 5 Extras 1b 0lb 0nb 0pen 7w 8 Total (19.1 overs) 176-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-59 Narine, 2-108 Uthappa, 3-139 Russell, 4-171 Karthik Did Not Bat : Mavi, Chawla, Johnson, Yadav Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Tim Southee 4 0 34 0 8.50 2w Umesh Yadav 3.1 0 36 0 11.37 Yuzvendra Chahal 4 0 29 0 7.25 Mohammed Siraj 4 0 40 2 10.00 4w Murugan Ashwin 4 0 36 2 9.00 1w Umpire Nigel Llong Umpire Anil Chaudhary Video Virender Sharma Match Referee Manu Nayyar
